title: WTB: T206 PSA 4+ Grades (Only a Few Left to go!)
author: BuffettFan

posts.post_title: WTB: T206 PSA 4+ Grades (Only a Few Left to go!)
posts.post_content:
With the help of several on this board I am getting closer!  

Still looking for:

Lajoie With Bat
Tinker Portrait
[STRIKE]Tinker Hand on Knees [/STRIKE][Got one!]

PSA 4-5 range preferred (no SGC and hopefully with no creases)

Also looking for a low grade Drum , BL 460 back and a signed T206 (I know I may be reaching here for these)!

I have a few hundred other T206s for further TRADE BAIT, including HOFs, SLs, tough commons, et al. mostly in PSA 2-3 / SGC 30-50, but some duplicates in higher grade, if it helps.

PM or email (michael at pnre.com):cool:

Thanks!

Michael

Wanted to get this back on page one, in case anyone has checked their T206 inventory and has one or two of these to discuss.  

If you are looking for a tough common or HOF, I may have it, so let's discuss a trade...

Thanks!
